thread.title: Watch: Aaradhya and Azad dance together, Aishwarya, Abhishek and Aamir cheer on!
thread.title_full: Watch: Aaradhya and Azad dance together, Aishwarya, Abhishek and Aamir cheer on!

author: Karishma Shetty
title: Watch: Aaradhya and Azad dance together, Aishwarya, Abhishek and Aamir cheer on!
text:
January 7, 2017 Karishma Shetty 11388 reads 1 comments 
Aaradhya Bachchan and Azad Rao Khan recently performed together, at their school function. The two munchkins looked adorable as they wore matching costumes and danced to the song - Rail Gaadi. 

— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 

Aaradhya's parents Abhishek Bachchan and Aishwarya Rai Bachchan along with Azad's dad Aamir Khan were sitting in the front row as they cheered for their kids. 
Watch how excited Abhishek and Aishwarya get as Aaradhya appears on the stage during the finale pic.twitter.com/bFJZ3vldNM 
— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 Aishwarya being a proud mum takes videos of Aaradhya as she's on stage pic.twitter.com/QbbgggbDdZ 
— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 

Towards the end of the show, as they played Abhishek's songs - the handsome actor went and high-fived Aaradhya and her friends and even danced with them while Aishwarya took videos of her adorable daughter. 

— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 Aishwarya goes up to the stage to meet Aaradhya and her friends pic.twitter.com/33ZOu1JEAw 
— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 Abhishek goes to meet Aaradhya and her friends whilst Aishwarya takes their photos pic.twitter.com/MY9JOryIpH 
— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017 Finally a cute video where Aishwarya makes Aaradhya and her friends dance whilst she takes their videos pic.twitter.com/vAle2DtROu 
— Bewitching Bachchans (@TasnimaKTastic) January 7, 2017
